location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Rough Sketch Map Showing Jabal Naksh, Qatar Peninsula

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; black ink with typewritten place names.Dimensions: 329 x 204mm.

mods.abstract: Rough sketch map depicting the south-western part of the Qatar Peninsula. The map, which is a rough illustration and is not to scale, estimates the approximate location of Jabal Dukhan [Jabal Dukhān, Qatar], Jabal Naksh [Khashm an Nakhsh, Qatar], Al 'Araiq [Al ‘Urayq, Qatar], Al Mashabiyah [Al Masḩabīyah, Qatar] and Salwa [Salwá, Saudi Arabia].
